descriptionlist.description: 启用ssh到localhost，以安装诸如提示2或Server Auditor之类的应用商店终端客户端。安装新的ssh端口后，将激活50022端口，该端口应在使用终端客户端登录时使用。要通过提示2或Server Auditor连接，请输入 主机地址为127.0.0.1，端口为50022

screenshot.description: This is a description for screenshot 1. It's Cydia!
This is a description for screenshot 2. It's another Cydia!

changelog.change: Cleanup of unnecesary files as well as higher reliability of custom ssh service
